body:
Exactly one year ago I was accepted for my junior moderator trial (June 5th, 2015) and since then I improved a lot overtime and eventually got Senior Moderator on September 13th, 2015. Later I was promoted to Map Developer October 3rd, 2015 and later Official on October 31st. I guess I'm kinda glad I stayed for this long with all of the "event's" and issues that happened along the way but I'm still here today so Ask me Almost Anything b/c If there is a question I wouldn't be ok with asking or don't really feel like it then I might or might not answer it so ask away!

A little bit about me is that I just turned 15 years old on May 15th
I'm from Louisiana, USA.
Lowkey can't wait to get back to school to start off Advanced Technical Drafting & Architectural II classes.
Formerly known as lil_greg15

Also congratulations to resepignev, Vobaseball12, & DaBadgerMc who also passed their one year mark also!!

*Ask Away*!

replies.body:
Opinions on me?
You are a cool guy! But I don't get to see you that often due to timezones, maybe that will change a little since I'm on summer break.

What motivates you to continue your role as a staff member?
Well what motivates me is all the people I get to meet and how I enjoy my job a bit. If not I would have retired but instead I stuck around for a while and things got better but it isn't as it used to be.

I don't know anymore since I've already accomplished a lot xD

Developed a few systems and helped out a lot with event planning and also became a map developer which was a dead dream that Fouled made come true.

Because I don't want to leave a lot of people behind and I like helping out here.

Opinion on me?
Best Batman
